name: fingertree-actually-good
description: A javascript implementation of fingertrees that is actually good. i.e. bug free, feature-rich, fast and light-weight.

scripts.generate-md-docs: rimraf tmp && typedoc --exclude "**/+(*test*|node_modules)/**" --excludePrivate --includeDeclarations --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --theme markdown --hideSources --hideBreadcrumbs --mode file --out tmp && replace "^## (Hierarchy|Index)(\n|.)*?(?=([^#]##[^#]))" "" tmp -r && rimraf tmp\README.md && replace "(.|\n)*###  fingertree" "# Function: fingertree<**MeasureMonoid**>" tmp/globals.md && node -e "require('fs').rename('tmp/globals.md', 'tmp/1_globals.md', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })" && concat-md --toc --decrease-title-levels --start-title-level-at 1 tmp > docs\2_api.md && concat-md --decrease-title-levels docs > README.md && rimraf tmp

author: Elias Sundqvist
